examples.example: 她不但学习成绩优异，还很擅长体育运动。

translate.english: She not only has excellent academic performance, but also is very good at sports.

examples.example: 他不但工作努力，还很乐于助人。

translate.english: He not only works hard, but also is very helpful.

examples.example: 她不但歌唱得好听，还能自己创作歌曲。

translate.english: She not only sings beautifully, but also can create songs by herself.
